TopicTitle: Is there a precise ship editor?

Articles.Content: Title says it all is there a mod/tool that lets me precisely construct ships(coordinate or grid system or something else)? Example lets say I'm radially mounting a 2x2 panel to a fuel tank and I want an edge of the panel to line up with the front of the fuel tank (i.e. same axis coordinate). Can this be done? I don't see anything in stock KSP that does this
I'm not talking about clipping parts together just precise alignment on places I can already put them.
